title: Lag Spikes in only League of Legends
body:
hello, im a person who has lag spikes this is so annoying when im in a game it does it in crucial moments i have looked around forums for abit and even went through riot support but it wasn't really much of help. My ping would be at 35ms then it would randomly jumped to 300-400 then back down to 35. I went through hextech its not a packet loss issue and i had this since beginning of 2016 and this made me quit lol for awhile and i started to ply again now but still have this issue. I have verizon fios, EST Coast in Rhode Island. I have and i5 and a GTX1060
NOTE:THIS ONLY HAPPENS IN LOL EVERYOTHER GAME IS FINE
Does anyone whats happening to me? or has anyone else have a similar situation

replies.body: Those kinds of random ping spikes are most likely going to either be some issue with your ISP or some form of packet loss. I know you mentioned that you knew already it wasn't packet loss, but let's go ahead and check again just in case. Run that [**log reader**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743) with some network logs from a game that had those random 400 ping spikes, and post that image here for me to see.
